name: Sport for Healing & Coach Workforce Development
description: BYTE will provide 6-8 -hrs/wk of on-unit, out-of-school classes, with 3 program tracks. Noncommitted youth receive open, introductory tennis and sport classes (all ages, all levels) as a chance to exercise, build community, engage with a caring adult, and learn unfamiliar skills. Secure track youth receive tailored long-term progressions in 3 possible tracks: 1) Introductory Tennis & Sport 2) Fitness Mentorship: weight-lifting, personal training, progressive program building, career exposure 3)
